LanguageData.ATR_StasisPill.label: Stasis pill
LanguageData.ATR_StasisPill.description: A small pill containing a slurry of highly conductive, mildly sedative synthetic chemicals. When ingested by mechanical units, the chemicals will greatly reduce power consumption at the cost of reduced work efficiency.\n\nDesigned for long-distance travel without access to reliable power, this pill will reduce power consumption by 75% at a 50% work speed penalty for ~3 days. Commonly used by raiders, traders, and soldiers who value efficiency and who don't engage in labor.
